title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.2 - Standards for the care of seized dogs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.2 - Standards for the care of seized dogs

State Regulations

Every dog seized pursuant to article 7 of the Agriculture
and Markets Law, or any local law, ordinance, or order adopted or issued
pursuant thereto, shall be properly cared for, sheltered, fed and watered for
the redemption period provided by said article or for the period established by
local law or ordinance as authorized by said article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
77.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
